_v.en: Indeed We sent it down on the Night of Ordainment.
And what will show you what is the Night of Ordainment?

_v.ar: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
_v.en: The Night of Ordainment is better than a thousand months.

_v.ar: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
_v.en: In it the angels and the Spirit descend, by the leave of their Lord, with every command.
It is peaceful until the rising of the dawn.
